description: Welcome to Citadel Mews! This spacious 4 Bed, 4 Bath, 1,975sq.ft home offers plenty of space for the whole family! A spacious living room w/ inviting views of the backyard greenspace makes for a cozy place to relax with your family. The bright updated kitchen offers a large breakfast bar & S/S appliances. Upstairs boasts 2 large bedrooms & an extra large Primary Bedroom. The updated Ensuite is a must see! 1 more bedroom downstairs could also make a great rec/movie room, or office space. New furnace and A/C installed in 2023, all windows & balcony doors replaced in Spring 2025. This well-located end unit has 3 balconies and backs onto greenspace.
